While this game is fun and challenging but the queue and loading of this game is total crap. I have to close and reopen my game over 20 times just to join a proper game. The game would say "fail to join game" and it would totally bugged out and show the loading screen symbol but still allow me to click on other option such as settings or open menu. This game bug way too often and fail with its queue to join a lobby. While I am able to play sometimes but this bug it is a total turn off and I would not recommend buying this game cause of the bug.

Edit: 7/23/17 Many months since my last review and this game still have connection problem that the developers dont bother to fix. I really wish I could get a refund cause I waste more time trying to get into a queue/game than playing it. I have so many hours on my account cause I get tired of trying to join a game from the constant "connection problem this game have" and just go afk with the game open.

Updated review 11/6/2019:  After quitting this game for awhile and came back recently I am happy to see that developers made a lot of improvement to the game. The connection seems so much more stable but finding a match can still take some time at certain moments. There have been a bunch of new characters, killers, and maps to play so it is great to see that this game is still developing. So I would recommend this game as of now.

*sigh* When the killer in the match is insanely geared and leveled up.

Seriously tho, I feel like the developers should have a option to be put in a match with similarily leveled people.

Will not recommended to friends if they are solo players unless they like to be a Killer that get abused most of the time by some survivors. First of all, the bugs, god damn it don't even want to start talking about the bugs, you can found a lot of glitches in game.  Second, the game matching system.  I played as a Rank 1 survivor and pair with 2! 2 newbies survivors against a Rank 2 Killer.  They did not even know how to play, I don't blame them for ruined everything because they are new.  On the other hand, Killer is having advantage on it and is like a 2v1 with 2 spectators that actually making everything worst for survivors.  And the last thing, facecamp, which mean the Killer just staring at you after you get hooked, I personal don't think thats a bad behavior because they dont get that much points if they did. Yet, some people always like to ruin other's day. So don't lay your hand on this game unless you have friends to play with you.

I have to say that I was incredibly tentative in purchasing this game because it was so new. When I finally did end up buying it I immediately ran into issues the very first time I tried to open it after installing. Long story short I had to fix 2 separate issues that were not caused by me just to get into the main menu. That should have been my wake up call to get a refund but I still ended up pushing forward because it just looked so cool, and boy do I have mixed feelings.

Before posting this review I found several others that spoke specifically to the hacking and exploiting being employed by a large portion of the player base. I can definitively back up those claims as I run into a hacker more than 50% of the time I get into a game. The developers seem to have been oddly silent towards fixing any of these issues and in some cases they make the game entirely unplayable.

My biggest issue by far though has to be the bugs. I knew going into this that there was going to be some pain because it was so new. I'm happy to get a newer or even alpha/beta game when it's cheap and provide feedback to the developers to help fix things; but holy shit, this game is incredibly broken. I'll sit down for a couple of hours one night to try and play this game and only end up playing the actual game for all of maybe 20 minutes. The load times are absolutely ridiculous and through the roof, I'm constantly getting kicked out of wait queues and actual games, and it is incredibly infuriating to wait 30 minutes to get into a match only to find out that my killer is hacking and I have no hope of winning much less racking up a decent score before he murders me.

Overall I can easily say that this game is not worth it, even on a sale. That being said it makes me really sad to have to say that because this game has so much potential and on the super rare occassions that I can actually play it without having to deal with hackers I enjoy the hell out of it. I will continue to check back and stay on top of new developments as I have high hopes for what this game can become and should be, but at the current moment it is an absolute joke.

Fix your damn game.

During the testing server, Pinhead had voice lines which were then removed because they were intended to be sold as part of the NFT deal assumedly, not for the people who purchased the character.

Awful for the company and awful for the planet at large.

Constantly holds PTBs (Public Testing Environments) meant to test new mechanics/survivors/killers but regardless of feedback, no bugs get fixed or changed, and it goes live without fixes.

As a whole i would rate the game a 7/10 as of now.
Tirando alguns bugs, o jogo é otimo. Super recomendo

After nearly three hundred hours of playing and holding out hoping that the devs would pull their heads out of their collective ass, I've given up and can't reccomend this game. It has such great potential, but it's almost certainly never going to be realized.

The game is full of rampant bugs and balance issues, some of which date back to the "beta test" from the game's release, some from the issues brought in by the multiple DLC's. The devs seem to be incapable of implementing changes without breaking multiple things and the bugfixes range from within a few days to months, or simply never being fixed.

Balance is awful; at low levels, killers will likely stomp the survivors. At high levels with everyone fully kitted out with perks, the survivors can basically spend the entire game goofing off and toying with the killer until they escape.

The DLCs are lackluster, and as stated before, generally introduce a whole host of new bugs and issues.

The dev's stance on exploits and balance is hilariously inconsistent; they go from "Infinites are bad and cheesy, don't use them" to "Infinites are a mind game!". They go from "Our stats show the nurse isn't better than any other killer, we're not changing her." to "We're nerfing the nurse really hard". The most recent exploit involves using perks and items from survivors on killers and vice versa; the devs went from "We're not going to give big streamers the same punishment as others who use the exploit because they're our marketing" (a tweet from a dev which has since been deleted) to "Ok, we'll punish the streamers too" after a massive outcry.

This game has so much potential, but the devs seem to be intent on running their game into the ground and then hiding behind legions of fans who'll scream "But they're just an indie dev!" (of 40+ people, backed by Starbreeze, when they apparently have enough people to both work on DbD and work on other games at the same time). "But they're fixing the bugs!" (Very slowly, and only after people yell at them for months at a time to fix the most egregious issues.) "But the devs are great and listen and communicate with us!" (Their communication is generally "We know of X issue and we're working on it. No eta. :)" or "Stop whining, our stats show it's fine". ) or my favorite, "But you're just being an entitled whiner!"

If we buy a game, we are in fact entitled to a working game that doesn't hang on loading screens every other game, or try to deal with bugs and exploits that have been in the game since launch. It's so incredibly disappointing that they've had this long to fix their game and steadfastly refuse to.

Here's hoping Friday the 13th and Last Year will provide some competention to incentivize the devs to fix their game.

Игра прикольная! Разнообразие карт, интересный геймплей, игра реально заставляет напрягаться когда от мньяка прячешься, в общем берите - не пожалеете!

Eigentlich ist es ein gutes Spiel, welches (meistens) recht gut Laune macht, aber zurzeit gibt es einfach viel zu viele Bugs im Spiel die einen den ganzen Spielspaß nehmen, und da jene, die diese Bugs mit Absicht benutzen ( spreche hier vorallem vom derzeitigen Perk -Bug [ man kann zB als Killer ein Perk von den Überlebenden mitnehmen, wo man die Überlebenden sieht]) nicht bestraft werden und die Entwickler auch recht lange brauchen, um Bugs zu beheben (wenn sie sie überhaupt beheben) kann ich es NICHT EMPFEHLEN.

Die Idee ist gut, das Killer-Angebot is inzwischen auch sehr gut. Balancing ist allerdings kaum vorhanden. Es gibt auf beiden Seiten Sachen, die eine dringende Überarbeitung bedürfen. Bestes Beispiel wieder die Perks.
Bei den Überlebenden: Decisive Strike - Damit kann man sich aus dem Griff des Killers sofort befreien ( ist aber auch verbuggt)
Bei den Killern: Eiserner Griff - Damit dauert es länger, bis der Überlebende aus dem Griff des Killers freikommt. 
Außerdem sollten bestimmte Perkkombinationen nicht möglich sein ( IG und Agi; Sb und Sc, Mashine Gun Build)

Das Matchmaking ist größtenteils auch ein Witz. Wenn man als Rang 1 Killer Überlebende mit 12 Spielstunden jagen muss, ist das auch kein Spaß, für beide Seiten nicht.

Es macht meistens Spaß, aber ich kann es im Moment einfach nicht empfehlen.Es müssten sich dafür einige Dinge ändern ( im Game, bei den Entwicklern, aber auch in der Community)

Edit: Disregard previous review. The devs fixed alot of the issues and the game is great now.

Je ne reviendrais pas sur ce jeu tant que les Put*** de bug de chargements ne seront pas réglés.

Je m'explique:
Le jeux etait bien avant, mais maintenant un bug de merde a fait son apparition, cet a dire que quand vous cliquez sur l'onglet "Incarner un survivant" et que vous cliquez sur "lancer la recherche de partie" il y a 2/3 que un écran de chargement s'affiche et simule un battement de coeur, ce qui fait qu'il faut directement redémarrer le putain de jeu en question car biensûr après cela, vous ne pourrez pas quitter le chargement, bas bien sûr ... Vous croyez quoi ... sa serait trop facile.

De plus après une recherche longue et intensive soit le chargement bug, soit un mec se barre par ce qu'il a la mégagigaflemme d'attendre comme un con devant son pc ou alors tu crash ....

Alors bon, ok c'est un bon jeu mais je ne le recommande pas, du moins si vous n'êtes pas patient.

This game is so broken right now it's not worth buying. They are wrongly displaying the game as a full release, but this game should be in Early Access for many reasons. One of those is the lack of optimization the devs put into the game. Another would be the infinite loading screens that happen to most people, and to me personally, every time they play. There are also other bugs for the killers to abuse to give them advantage as well as glitches that survivors can do for both an advantage or to look cool (such as the chainsaw one or glitching out of the map). If you want to buy the game then just know that it's early access and that the devs are completely ignoring all of the bugs right now as if they're on vacation.

By the way, I own another account which has played much more than this one, I just use family sharing.

Il concept, l'idea è qualcosa di spettacolare, anche i personaggi, solo i loro aspetti trasmettono un certo carisma...
Differentemente da quanto han fatto gli altri recensori vorrei dare dei punti più dettagliati sui problemi di questo gioco, perciò inizierò dai problemi/difetti:

- Il Killer hosta:
  Su questo gioco l'host è il killer perciò in caso lui esca o per rage quit o crash etc.. tutti i survivor perderanno rank, senza parlare del fatto del lag... in caso il killer abbia una connessione scadente ciò si ripercuote sui survivor, non su quest'ultimo...

- Bug nella schermata principale: [FIXED]
  Spessissimo accade che si è impossibilitati ad iniziare una partita, se non dopo diversi tentativi perchè il gioco sbaglia a "combinare" i vari menù ingame e l'unica soluzione è riavviare il gioco attraverso alt+F4 e continuare a riavviarlo in questo modo finchè non troverà una partita (accade principalmente di sera tarda/notte verso le 00:00fino alle 7:00

- Matchmaking lento [PARZIALMENTE RISOLTO]
   Moltissimi si lamentano di questo fatto ma onestamente a me non sembra così lento, almeno non quanto lo descrivono.. forse viene così penalizzato perchè prima vi è una lobby con l'amico, poi un altra col killer e dopo un'ulteriore caricamento inizierà la partita (se tutto va bene) ma i tempi non sono esageratamente lungi

- Glitch/Exploit [FIXED]
   Ormai il famosissimo exploit dell'intercambiabilità dei poteri tra mostri sta invadendo il gioco, trapper con motosega, infermiera con motosega etc... insomma... va sistemato questo piccolo ma grande glitch tra i due menù.. 

- Vantaggio Killer [FIXED]
   Molte persone parlano di quest'ipotetico quanto inesistente vantaggio dei killer mentre non è così, penso che i survivor siano nettamente avvantaggiati dai loro perk come premonizione per esempio, usando intelligenza e il cosiddetto teamwork... 

Come già detto questo gioco ha dalla sè il format pseudo innovativo, DLC simpatici, economici e rivoluzionari per il gameplay aggiungendo perk, mostri e survivors..
Per me i punti negativi da me stesso sopra elencati mi lasciano comunque godere al 75% il gioco, ma comunque si può fare insomma ma comprendo gli altri e vorrei che il messaggio di tutti noi arrivasse in qualche modo ai devs perciò mi sento in dovere di lasciare un fb negativo...
Sarà mia cura modificarlo in caso di fix nei prossimi aggiornamenti e rivalutare il mio parere.

El juego en si es entretenido y tal, pero ahora mismo no puedo encontrar partida como superviviente, sale el mensaje de "no se pudo encontrar partida" o se queda pillado cargando el juego, tengo que hacer control alt suprimir y cerralo. O solucionan este error pronto o dejare de jugar

Nonostante le mie poche ore posso dare delle opinioni su questo gioco.
Dead by Daylight è un gioco che concettualmente rende,le mappe sono ben fatte (almeno quelle presenti in questa versione) e l'atmosfera rende molto,il gameplay è sicuramente ben fatto con un sistema che apprezzo.
Ma comunque pecca in 2 aspetti fondamentali: 1)Matchmaking orribile,è difficilissimo trovare una partita con un amico ho dovuto aspettare 30 minuti di matchmaking e non sto scherzando.2)Troppi bug che influenzano negativamente il gioco.
Se dovessi dare un voto a questa versione sarebbe un 7/10 spero che gli svilupattori continueranno a supportarlo e migliorarlo come meglio possono ma nonostante ciò lo consiglio soprattutto a chi è un amante dei survival horror e coop.

Bug riddled mess. You can cheat and hack the game using fucking Cheat Engine. Let that sink in. There is an item that lets the killer instantly kill survivors when downed instead of needing to be hooked, and you can use Cheat Engine to give yourself that item when you don't already have it. You can also use Cheat Engine and a simple in-game exploit (Don't even need CE) to give yourself the same perk four fucking times. They stack. All of them. You can heal instantly, leave no footprint, etc.

The devs do not care about the game and it is a bug riddled shitfest. Do NOT buy until the developers stop prioritizing DLC for money and instead focus on community ideas and bugs.

Dead by the time the Round Loads. Here's a summary of the game:

Choose a survivor or killer.
Wait for the fourth survivor to check "Ready".
Wait another 30 seconds for the round to force start because the fourth survivor never does.
Wait indefinitely for the round loading screen to begin.
One of four matches will load into a mostly fun game.
The other three will either drop you back into the initial character selection screen, or leave you hanging in "Loading" indefinitely.

Dead by Daylight- in short a 1v4 horror game. 1 player is the killer, who's ultimate goal is to place the survivors onto hooks and sacrifice them. 4 players are survivors, who have to complete 5 generators as a team, unlock an exit gate, and run to freedom

[b] Pros [/b]

- Survivor can be very scary
- Killer is extremely fun for the most part
- Lots of variety of perks and characters to customise your survivor/killer with
- Many different playstyles according to perks or (Only for killer) character chosen
- Matchmaking has been fixed mostly, queues for me don't last longer than 30 seconds now
- Able to easily queue with your friends
- Private, unranked, matches available for fun where items aren't used
- A different game every match, with different killers who run different perks, or different teammates etc.
- In my opinion, a friendly community (On discords etc)
- Friendly devs with frequent streams and good tech support
- Many updates

[b] Cons [/b]

- Connection depends on the killer's internet- extremely laggy connections are quite common
- High rank survivor gameplay is quite tough, killers know a variety of tricks that they really shouldn't be able to do
- Lots of bugs and hacks- For the most part hacking isn't prominent, but glitches and bugs are present, and are abused
- High rank killer gameplay can sometimes seem futile when facing 4 master jukers who taunt you constantly
- The survivors are basically reskins, they have their own perks but when you get them to certain levels they unlock those perks for the other survivors
- The game has major balancing issues with perks and killers- some perks are useless, some are essential (cough decisive strike)
- Matchmaking in terms of ranks can be horrible. Rank 20 (The worst rank in the game) killers can be matched with rank 1 (The best rank the in game) survivors
- Ranking up can be tedious for both sides, you have to get enough points from 4 categorys to pip, and 3-5 pips earn you a rank up
- DLC is almost always paid, and only includes 1 survivor and 1 killer- not necessarily bad, just worth mentioning
- Infinites exist. And they suck

This game is absolute shit.  Im not even going to TRY and sugarcoat it.  Yet another shining reason why "Early Access" is a terrible fucking idea and should have been scrapped ages ago. 

*EDIT* - Since Steam or the Developers won't tell you.. The "Deluxe" Edition.. does NOT INCLUDE the DLC.  It includes a useless "soundtrack" and "art book" .. a completely worthless purchase.  Standard Edition is the way to go, purchase the DLC seperately. (Actually, don't.  Just don't. )

Game locks up .. and THEN Crashes when you attempt to connect to another game.

Game has MASSIVE UNPATCHED exploits that completely decimate any sense of immersion, fair play, or continuity.

Game randomly resets all your hard won gains back to zero.. cause fuck you, that's why!

Thankfully, I was able to get out with my cash in hand.. many others arent so fortunate.

Friday the 13th will bury this game for good.  Don't waste your money.

Моя оценка снижена практически одной проблемой - Баги!
Моя оценка не будет актуальна уже через месяц, ибо разработчики прислушиваются к сообществу максимально.
Поэтому моя оценка положительная.

(This used to be a negative review made in 2016, due to the lack of bug fixes and massive balancing issues)

Edited TL:DR: I now recommend it. The game is much better, far more enjoyable, well balanced, and has much faster bug fixes. However the grind is insane even when compared to a game with regular wipes such as "Escape From Tarkov"

I've now revisited the game after a 4,5 year long break. The game has honestly improved a lot, and is definitely in the best spot it's ever been during the time periods I have played the game.

The devs seem to have fixed most of the issues I used to have with the game.(Completely broken killer builds, infinite loops easily abused when playing survivor, and general balancing issues and really slow bug fixing.

The game is now a lot of fun, and mostly well balanced although I still think SWF is a balancing issue but one that unfortunately can't be solved without killing the game, by simply removing the option, and losing a large part of the playerbase.

The main issue with the game now is simply the grind. The original perk system where each perk had 3 tiers to unlock, worked fine when there were only 3 killers and 4 survivors. However with the amount of killers og survivors in the game now, the progression system is simply outlandish. You still earn the same amount of bloodpoints pr. match as you did 5 years ago when the game first released, but now you have more than 3 times the amount of perks to unlock, and playable characters to level for those perks. Unlocking all perks for one character yet alone all characters will now take an absurd amount of time since you still have to unlock all the tiers of each perk before you've fully unlocked it.

I hope the devs will adress this absurd grind by either upping the bloodpoints you earn pr. match or preferably removing the tier system from the perks, and simply making the tier 3 perk, the only one available.

Buy it if you like to force-quit games with the task manager 4-5 times before you actually can join a singleplayer game. If you are 2 or more friends queueing, play something else since their matchmaking does all it can to prevent you from starting.
4/5 toasts, great loading game.
Ottimo gameplay, uno dei pochi giochi che riesci a giocare con piacere e facendo molte anche se fai due cose in tutto il gioco, davvero divertente e serio allo stesso tempo  da giocare con amici

Like many others, I like this game. There's not many other games that can effectively scratch the need to play hide-and-seek like this game does. There's so many things it gets right, and if you're a fan of horror movies like I am, you'll be thrilled at the little moments the game gets right: being chased by an unstoppable killer, desperate for some help or relief (or being the one doing the chasing).

Obviously, this would be a huge, stonking thumbs up if everything else bar the gameplay was in place- which it just isn't.

The matchmaking and lobby system for DBD is absolutely horrendous, and will be the true thing you'll be struggling with constantly, rather than a killer. You'll get into lobbies, only to be unceremoniously kicked or crashed to your desktop. You'll connect into a game and the killer will instantly drop. Sometimes the game won't give you the pleasure of letting you know a queue's failed for some random reason and you'll just be sitting there with your mates twiddling your thumbs in the lobby.

Long loading times abound, endless loading screens as well. This is a well-reported issue to the DBD devs, judging by older reviews from Early Access, and remains unfixed.

It pains me to say don't buy this, but it's the only fair response. Until the networking issues are fixed, this is a flawed gem, with all the caveats that come with it. Keep it on your wishlist, check the discussion forums/Reddit or whatever takes your fancy, and pick it up when it's fixed- if that ever happens.

"Dead By Daylight" evet beyler bayanlar işte karşınızda çıktığı günden bu yana ses getiren bir oyun.Özellikle son zamanlarda neredeyse %60 kadar steam kullanıcısın kütüphanesinde bulunan bağımsız yapım.Bana sorarsanız verdiği heyecan ve gerilimi hatta stresiyle oldukça başarılı bir yapım.Metacritic ya da diğer sitelerin verdiği puanlara nalet girsin bence oldukça zevkli.Tek olumsuz yanı arada saçma bugları ve bazen lobby bulamaması ama bunuda gelen güncellemeyle hallediyorlar.Uzun lafın kısası ister tek başınıza ister arkadaşlarınızla gerek katil gerek kurban olun her türlü eğlenceli bir oyun.(10.7.9)
